name: Host Shift
description:
Submission for GMTK Jam 2020

Host shift is a stealth game where you lose control over your body each time you move. You need to sap from other people to slowly regain control.

Avoid getting seen by the guards and latch on them by shooting a projectile. While latched, you will  be stuck on them and you will be undetected. While you are latched, you cannot move but you regenerate control points which allows you to control your character once you disconnect to your host.

WSAD / Arrow keys - to move.
LMB - to shoot projectile / disconnect (while latched)

-Credits-

Audio - OpenGameArt (TinyWorlds, Longor, pauliuw)

              - freesfx.co

Guard 3d model by Quaternius (https://twitter.com/quaternius) from his free character pack.
